original_text: The Lord is the one who rescues Israel. As surely as the Lord lives, I promise that I will punish the man who has done this bad thing. Whoever it is must die, even if it is my own son Jonathan.’ But nobody in the army said anything.
korean_text: 이스라엘을 구원하신 여호와께서 살아 계심을 두고 맹세하노니 내 아들 요나단에게 있다 할지라도 반드시 죽으리라 하되 모든 백성 중 한 사람도 대답하지 아니하매

sentences.original_text: The Lord is the one who rescues Israel.
As surely as the Lord lives,
I promise that I will punish the man
who has done this bad thing.
even if it is my own son Jonathan.'
But nobody in the army said anything.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 군대에서는 아무도 아무 말도 하지 않았습니다.
